title: Billionaire Sex Saga Is Latest Scandal To Rock Australian CEOs
content: The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.
summary: The alleged sex-for-investment scandal embroiling Australian tech billionaire Richard White is just the latest corporate calamity in a country fast losing its reputation as a tightly-regulated market with strict governance standards.

title: US Health Advisers Back Pfizer, Merck Pneumonia Shots For Adults Over 50
content: A key panel of US health advisers voted in favor of lowering the age recommendation for vaccines made by Pfizer Inc and Merck & Co that protect against pneumococcal disease, clearing a path for wider use.
summary: A key panel of US health advisers voted in favor of lowering the age recommendation for vaccines made by Pfizer Inc and Merck & Co that protect against pneumococcal disease, clearing a path for wider use.

title: US Model Claims Plastic Surgeon Boyfriend Turned Her Into Sex Slave
content: The $10 million suit details a pattern of shocking abuse and control, with Mahmoud exploiting his position of power as a medical professional to manipulate and harm Ms Sias.
summary: The $10 million suit details a pattern of shocking abuse and control, with Mahmoud exploiting his position of power as a medical professional to manipulate and harm Ms Sias.

title: Donald Trump vs Kamala Harris: Who Has Lead Days Before US Polls
content: With less than two weeks to go until the November 5 US presidential election, republican candidate Donald Trump has gained a slight lead over his Democratic rival Kamala Harris, a new Wall Street Journal poll found on Wednesday.
summary: With less than two weeks to go until the November 5 US presidential election, republican candidate Donald Trump has gained a slight lead over his Democratic rival Kamala Harris, a new Wall Street Journal poll found on Wednesday.

title: Pfizer, Merck Pneumonia Shots Approved For Adults Over 50
content: A key panel of US health advisers voted in favor of lowering the age recommendation for vaccines made by Pfizer Inc. and Merck & Co. that protect against pneumococcal disease, clearing a path for wider use.

title: US Elections: Kamala Harris Calls Donald Trump A 'Fascist'
content: US Elections 2024: Kamala Harris called Donald Trump a "fascist" and warned that her US election rival was "increasingly unstable" as she addressed his reported praise for Adolf Hitler at a town hall event.
summary: US Elections 2024: Kamala Harris called Donald Trump a "fascist" and warned that her US election rival was "increasingly unstable" as she addressed his reported praise for Adolf Hitler at a town hall event.

title: Slivered Onions Likely Culprit, Says McDonald's As It Tackles E-Coli Crisis
content: McDonald's Corp. supplier Taylor Farms is recalling some yellow onion batches produced in a Colorado facility in response to a deadly E. coli outbreak at the burger chain.
summary: McDonald's Corp. supplier Taylor Farms is recalling some yellow onion batches produced in a Colorado facility in response to a deadly E. coli outbreak at the burger chain.

title: Microsoft Struggles To Retain Women, Minority Employees
content: Microsoft Corp.'s female, Black and Latinx employees are leaving at an increasing rate, a trend that's complicating the company's efforts to build a more diverse workforce.
summary: Microsoft Corp.'s female, Black and Latinx employees are leaving at an increasing rate, a trend that's complicating the company's efforts to build a more diverse workforce.

title: Rapper Diddy's Employees Allegedly Made To Carry Pink Cocaine
content: A complaint filed against Sean "Diddy" Combs earlier this year alleged that his employees were required to carry pink cocaine also known as "Tuci," a drug that was also found in Liam Payne's system after his death, according to People.
summary: A complaint filed against Sean "Diddy" Combs earlier this year alleged that his employees were required to carry pink cocaine also known as "Tuci," a drug that was also found in Liam Payne's system after his death, according to People.

title: Canada MPs Call For Justin Trudeau's Resignation, Set October 28 Deadline
content: Internal calls for Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's resignation as Liberal leader intensified on Wednesday as Liberal MPs convened on Parliament Hill, according to a report by CBC News.
summary: Internal calls for Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's resignation as Liberal leader intensified on Wednesday as Liberal MPs convened on Parliament Hill, according to a report by CBC News.

title: Couple Uses Handbag Trick To Flee Scotland Restaurant Without Paying Bill
content: In an attempt to deceive staff, the woman left her handbag behind, suggesting she would return.
summary: In an attempt to deceive staff, the woman left her handbag behind, suggesting she would return.

title: Canada Cuts Immigration Target By 21% After Record Growth
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government is reducing inflows of newcomers for the first time in more than a decade, ushering in a new era for a country that once embraced high levels of immigration.
summary: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau's government is reducing inflows of newcomers for the first time in more than a decade, ushering in a new era for a country that once embraced high levels of immigration.

title: Chinese Startup To Sell Tickets For 2027 Space Tourism Flights
content: Chinese startup Deep Blue Aerospace said on Thursday it will sell its first two tickets for seats on a rocket that will take passengers to space in 2027, charging 1.5 million yuan ($211,000) for the experience.
summary: Chinese startup Deep Blue Aerospace said on Thursday it will sell its first two tickets for seats on a rocket that will take passengers to space in 2027, charging 1.5 million yuan ($211,000) for the experience.

title: CCTV Shows Terrorists Firing With Assault Rifles During Turkey Attack
content: Five people were killed and 22 others injured in an attack on the headquarters of a top Turkish defence firm near Ankara.
summary: Five people were killed and 22 others injured in an attack on the headquarters of a top Turkish defence firm near Ankara.

title: US Teen Fell In Love With "Game Of Thrones" Chatbot, Killed Self: Mother
content: 14-year-old Sewell Setzer III, a Florida boy, would chat with his online friend, Daenerys Targaryen, a lifelike AI chatbot named after a character from Game of Thrones.
summary: 14-year-old Sewell Setzer III, a Florida boy, would chat with his online friend, Daenerys Targaryen, a lifelike AI chatbot named after a character from Game of Thrones.

title: Watch: Barack Obama Raps Eminem's 'Lose Yourself' At Detroit Rally
content: Rap icon Eminem and former US President Barack Obama shared a light-hearted moment at a rally for the Kamala Harris-Tim Walz campaign ahead of the presidential elections at later's hometown Detroit.

title: Al Jazeera Responds After Israel's Big Claim On 6 Gaza-Based Journalists
content: Israeli forces have branded six Gaza-based journalists of Al Jazeera as "terrorists", accusing them of being part of the Palestinian Hamas and Islamic Jihad groups.
summary: Israeli forces have branded six Gaza-based journalists of Al Jazeera as "terrorists", accusing them of being part of the Palestinian Hamas and Islamic Jihad groups.

title: Elon Musk Angers Eminem Fans With "Diddy" Remark After Obama Rally

title: Kamala Harris To Deliver Her Final Presidential Speech On October 29
content: Kamala Harris will make her "closing argument" on Tuesday against rival Donald Trump, a campaign official said, a key speech to be delivered at the Washington site where the ex-president rallied supporters before the January 6 riot.
summary: Kamala Harris will make her "closing argument" on Tuesday against rival Donald Trump, a campaign official said, a key speech to be delivered at the Washington site where the ex-president rallied supporters before the January 6 riot.

title: Amid BRICS Summit, Russian Foreign Ministry Hit By Massive Cyberattacks
content: The Russian Foreign Ministry was targeted by a severe cyber attack on Wednesday, coinciding with the major BRICS summit taking place in the country, spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said.
summary: The Russian Foreign Ministry was targeted by a severe cyber attack on Wednesday, coinciding with the major BRICS summit taking place in the country, spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said.
